channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: The Donut Shop kids struggle to forgive Cory for stealing from the shop's tip jar until they learn about the Mass, the importance of forgiveness, and how they all belong to the same family of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: EWTN foundress Mother Angelica takes a look at mercy, and where it comes from, where it fits into our lives, and what it means to all of us. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Rose Of Lima
channel.desc: An EWTN original movie on the life of St. Rose of Lima, whose great love of God and neighbor drove her to become a champion of the poor and afflicted in her native Peru, and the first saint of the Americas. (120 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: After a flooded engine leaves them stranded, Chris Stefanick and Catholic survivalist Will Hince journey through the wilderness; later, Chris witnesses the hunting power of a full-grown hawk. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Scott Weeman, founder of Catholic Recovery, discusses the healing effects of integrating the 12-step recovery principles with the Sacraments and traditions of the Catholic Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: While attending college, John Kramer?s Catholic faith faded but following a divorce the Holy Spirit led him home to his Catholic roots where he is now active in his local parish. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford explores the various methods of mercy introduced by Jesus to mankind and why they have been given to us. The thesis is that God's love is so great that His mercy abounds if we but seek it sincerely. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mere Cabrini Et Le Coeur De Jesus
channel.desc: Ce docudrame original d'EWTN pr?sente la vie et l?activit? missionnaire de saint Fran?ois-Xavier Cabrini et sa profonde d?votion au Sacr?-C?ur de J?sus. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: While teaching art history at an (anti Catholic) Baptist College, Jim Craft realized most of the ancient art was ?Catholic,? and began researching the Catholic Church?s history. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica looks at Matthew 20, and how it illustrates how tough the world is today. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Knight
channel.desc: The story of Maximilian Kolbe, a Polish Catholic priest who sacrificed his life to save a fellow prisoner at Auschwitz. His selflessness was a triumph of compassion over adversity. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: In a land where most find day-to-day life as simply one of survival, discover the hope thriving amidst a war ridden Syria, where their only refuge is Faith in God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! The Choices We Face
channel.desc: From the 2024 Lift Jesus Higher Rally in Toronto, Debbie Herbeck speaks about her Jewish upbringing, the death of her brother, how she came to find Jesus. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: Mother quotes St. John?s Gospel, ?You did not choose Me, I chose you.? She develops this theme to mean that all of us are called to be missionaries to those around us. It is not just for those who go into the mission fields. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Host Susan Conroy continues her look into how Teresa of Calcutta viewed prayer in our everyday lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Issues for anxious grandparents who are hoping to see their grandchildren raised as faithful Catholics are discussed in this show featuring Dan Spencer, founder of Legacy of Faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: A remote control toy robot helps prove that materialism and idolatry go hand in hand in this concluding episode between Thomas Aquinas and Rene Descartes. Learn who is sincere in his Faith and who is the imposter. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Patalinghug prepares the fresh catch of the day while relating all the biblical connections for seafood in the Bible and the early Christian Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
channel.desc: The Dominican Sisters of Mary teach the cardinal virtues to children, stressing the importance of practicing justice, prudence, fortitude, and temperance when forming a moral life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of Saint Joseph
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this inspirational litany asking for the prayers of Saint Joseph from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Fr. Grismer welcomes Bill Watkins to discuss how he converted to Catholicism, became the apostolate?s first volunteer, and now joins as a ?Roamin? Catholic? in the LourdesMobile. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen analyzes a few examples of thinking on the subject of comparative religions. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Knowing Mary Through The Bible
channel.desc: Dr. Edward Sri and a panel of college students look at how Mary shared in the sufferings of her son on Calvary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the old and new theology on Saint Paul, whether the Mormon church has a connection to God, and why Catholic bibles are bigger than Protestant. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explore the relationship between the Old and New Testaments and the Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Truth In The Heart
channel.desc: Sister Mary Joseph and the Truth in the Heart Choir explores another hymn written by St. Thomas Aquinas in honor of the Holy Eucharist, the Panis Angelicus. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: Father Miguel presents to the class the story of Saint Dominic de Guzm?n and pictures from his recent trip to Spain. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Joseph Pearce introduces great works of literature that have graced Catholic civilization over the centuries. Today, he examines the works of Homer, including The Iliad and The Odyssey, as well as Virgil's The Aeneid. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Adoration And Reparation
channel.desc: A special presentation of the Chaplet of Adoration and Reparation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Despite America's declining birth rate, about 5% of women in this country are defying the trend by bearing five or more children. Author Catherine Pakaluk expalins what's going on. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer continues his lecture on the Four Responsibilities of Leaderships and addresses the final two responsibilities; quality standards and team building. (30 minutes).
